ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab tests commonly used to measure hemoglobin done on a source of blood, serum or plasma with a reporting scale of mass/volume. These codes are LOINC codes.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of blood, serum or plasma for hemoglobin. Using the Quality Data Model, this data element maps to the Laboratory, Result or Laboratory, Order datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hemoglobin lab test using the source of blood/serum/plasma with a reporting scale of mass/volume represented using LOINC codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Do not include any codes or concepts which do not represent hemoglobin as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
